text:
Hello all you lovely FoodTubers!
Mister Oliver here. Hope you are all well.

I'm just in the garden at home. It's the kids
school holidays so I've got the week off.

And I'm picking some salads. It's all good.
But I've had some great news and it's all

about you guys! We have reached a quarter
of a million subscribers on FoodTube and that

is fantastic to achieve that amount of people,
so quickly. Since the beginning of the year,

really proud of that. Love Food Tube!
It's really, really exciting. We're starting

to get the hang of it. Of course if you like
it, like it. If you want to share it with

your friends, please share it.
Getting it out there, is a big deal. But honestly,

it's all about interacting with you lovely
people and giving you guys what you want.

We've got some new brilliant things coming up.
We've got some really, really good talent.

We're going to get more chefs, more crafts
people and we're going to celebrate them and

all their skills.
But until then guys, thank you so much! We

really, really appreciate you guys subscribing
and enjoying and liking what we're doing.

Please keep commenting, it's your channel.
I'm working for you. Tell us what you want

and we're going to get on it. And of course
if you have subscribed. Make sure you to the

little box and get the email button pressed
so when we do update new videos you get to

hear about it.
Lots of love guys! Thank you so, so much.

From me in Essex, with the kids. It's all
good.

And yes, if you saw that bathtub in the background.
That's how I wash salads in the country.

Yeah, that's how we roll. Bathtub. I didn't
say I was normal did i?!
